rules_text:
Haste
[i]Short Spear[/i] – When Oscar, Agile Horseman enters, you may have him fight up to one target creature. If you do, he gets +1/+1 until end of turn. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
[i]Canto[/i] – At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, you may return Oscar to your hand.
